fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Europese Aanbesteding en Europese Subsidies; deze zijn gericht om de Nederlandse Langdurige Zorg betaalbaar te houden
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: Vilans helpt zorgaanbieders, gemeenten en verzekeraars de langdurende zorg goed en betaalbaar te houden.
